sub get_OSgroup()
{
my $N = $Config{"osname"};
if($N=~/macos|darwin|rhapsody/i) {
return "macos";
}
elsif($N=~/freebsd|openbsd|netbsd/i) {
return "bsd";
}
elsif($N=~/haiku|beos/i) {
return "beos";
}
elsif($N=~/symbian|epoc/i) {
return "symbian";
}
elsif($N=~/win/i) {
return "windows";
}
else {
return $N;
}
}

"links"
);

}
}

}

} }
} }
